messages.subject: Re: [UnschoolingDiscussion] Homeschool picture books
messages.msgSnippet: Nichole, sorry, those weren t links, just the copy line of the library listing of the book.   I didn t realize that they would come across as web links.  Just
messages.messageBody:
Nichole, sorry, those weren't links, just the copy line of the library
listing of the book. I didn't realize that they would come across as web
links. Just check your library on-line system to see if they have them.


At 09:34 AM 6/29/2004, you wrote:
>Darn, not a single one of those links works for me. :o(
>
>Nichole

messages.subject: Homeschool picture books
messages.msgSnippet: I was cleaning up my unschooling.com email, and came across Amanda s email re picture books about homeschooling. Lurie, jon. J 649.68 LURIE
messages.messageBody:
I was cleaning up my unschooling.com email, and came across Amanda's email
re picture books about homeschooling.

Lurie, jon. J 649.68 LURIE
<http://catalog.sno-isle.org/cgi-bin//cgi-bin/cw_cgi?fullRecord+6470+86+10022497+56+2>Allison's
story : a book about homeschooling

Voetberg, julie. J 649.68 VOETBER
<http://catalog.sno-isle.org/cgi-bin//cgi-bin/cw_cgi?fullRecord+6470+86+9601220+63+2>I
am a home schooler

Strayer, debbie. J 649.68 STRAYER
<http://catalog.sno-isle.org/cgi-bin//cgi-bin/cw_cgi?fullRecord+6470+86+9481834+2+3>We
home school

The above were three books that my library had that are picture books. The
books below have pictures and sections that parents can read to younger
kids about homeschooling childhoods that both parents and child might find
interesting.

371.3944 REAL LI
<http://catalog.sno-isle.org/cgi-bin//cgi-bin/cw_cgi?fullRecord+6470+86+8664426+55+13>Real
lives : eleven teenagers who don't go to sc 1993

Card, susan, 1960- 371.042 CARD
<http://catalog.sno-isle.org/cgi-bin//cgi-bin/cw_cgi?fullRecord+6470+86+1006710361+3+14>The
homeschool journey

Barfield, rhonda. 371.042 BARFIEL
<http://catalog.sno-isle.org/cgi-bin//cgi-bin/cw_cgi?fullRecord+6470+86+94275331+1+14>Real
life homeschooling : the stories of 21 fami
